ABOUT THA

The Hamster Alliance is the one man music project I started in 1997, which has since expanded into the realms of video, graphic design, video games, voice over, and other work. Prior to The Hamster Alliance, I was Jamez the Giant Hamster on mp3.com. Now I’m just Hamst3r.

THA TOOLS

  • Cockos Reaper 4 (2001 - current)
  • Jeskola Buzz (1998 - 2011)
  • Sony Sound Forge 10
  • Celemony Melodyne 4
  • Samson C03U Microphone
  • Alesis Q25 MIDI Keyboard
  • Ibanez Q25 MIDI Keyboard
  • Macrodi Harpejji K24

Native Instruments (Komplete 10 Ultimate), Artura (V Collection 4), AIR Music Techology, Flux, reFX, Sample Modelling, Quik Quak, u-he, Voxengo, Wavesfactory, and Xoxos

8DIO, Bangin’ Beats, Heavyocity, Impact Soundworks, NaturalStudio, Neocymatics, Orange Tree, Pettinhouse, Pocket Blakus, Project SAM, Prosonus, Scarbee, Sonic Courture, Sound Iron, Sony, Strayworks, Theodor Krueger, Tonehammer, and freebies I find on the internet
